channel.title: Why are players better all of a sudden in the past couple weeks?
channel.description: I've been dying and losing a lot more in the past couple weeks. I sign on one day and suddenly people see through 3rd grade strats that use to work 99% of the time. It was about the time people started complaining about the Steam Sale bringing in noobs but it seems to me the opposite has happened.

item.title: Why are players better all of a sudden in the past couple weeks?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Livicus:

I secretly use meta tactics so that if someone good chooses the same name every single time, I kill them N1

cough PuppetMaster

Joke’s on you. That’s my whole plan

item.title: Why are players better all of a sudden in the past couple weeks?
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Shrimpy:

on one day and suddenly people see through 3rd grade strats that use to work 99% of the time. It was about the time people started complaining about the Steam Sale bringing in noobs but it seems to me the opposite has happened.

What the actual fuck?
